TopicTitle: Linux and Windows - crash when revert to launch or revert to VAB

Articles.Content:
Hi,

Please excuse my english mistakes or better correct them;)

KSP 1.0.4

Windows8.1 or Linux Mint 17 and Steam OS.

I don't use any graphic mod. I only use Ckan, alarm clock, module manager, redux, S.A.V.E, chaterrer.

I play since 1.5 month but since 4/5 days, the game crashes when revert to launch or revert to VAB.

I didn't add any mod recently. But there were Linux Mint updates lately...

I uninstall/install the game using Steam. It didn't fix this problem.

The problem doesn't seem to come from linux. I get the same problem while trying with Windows8.1 and using my game backups.

If I start a new carrier, the game doesn't crash

With Windows8.1, I get error message which indicates errorlogs!

Here are these logs https://www.dropbox.com/s/4vn371wmqyuecb0/2015-09-24_182126.zip?dl=0

Thanks for your help!

----

After a lot of tests, it appears the game crashes with some ships backup only!?

Isn't it weird? Is it a known issue?

Thanks for any answer...

Edited September 25, 2015 by nutopia
